Class LocationUpdater

  • java.lang.Object
    • make448greatagain.studybuddy.LocationUpdater
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.android.gms.common.api.GoogleApiClient.ConnectionCallbacks, com.google.android.gms.location.LocationListener

    class LocationUpdater
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.google.android.gms.common.api.GoogleApiClient.ConnectionCallbacks, com.google.android.gms.location.LocationListener
    Background task for updating location in the mySQL database. Created by Michael on 10/31/2016.
